title: Tassel
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: braided and knotted
dimensions: H x W: 15.2 x 5.1 cm (6 x 2 in.)
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: White linen tassel with pear-shaped base braided over with linen yarns to create zigzag pattern. From the bottom of the core hang elaborate knotted elements.

Tassel.
